name: SUPERHEATED ARMOR
effect: If you have Armor, you gain Resistance to all Heat from external sources so long as you are not Shredded.

name: RECOVERING MOMENTUM
effect: You gain +1 Repair Capacity. 1/scene, when you take the Stabilize action and choose to restore all HP, you may Grapple or Ram as a free action.

name: PLASMA GRASP
effect: You gain +2 Heat Capacity. When you Grapple a character or are successfully Grappled by another character, you may deal 1d3 AP energy damage to them.

name: WEAPON FIREWALL
effect: Choose one mount. Weapons attached to this mount may be used even when you are Jammed.
mounted_effect: Weapons attached to this mount may be used even when you are Jammed.

name: HEAVY PLATING
effect: When you are affected by involuntary movement, you may reduce the movement by up to a number of spaces equal to your Size, to a minimum reduction of 1 space.

name: IMPACT SHIELD
effect: You gain +3 HP. If a save effect would deal Structure damage to you, you are instead set to 1 HP and do not take Structure damage from the effect. This effect does not trigger if you are already at 1 HP.

name: HEAT VAPOR SHIELD
effect: When you become Exposed, you gain Overshield equal to half your maximum HP.

name: TECH FLANKING
effect: You gain +2 SP. When you successfully hit with a tech attack on your turn, you may Bolster an allied character that is Engaged with the target as a free action.

name: DEFENSIVE CODE
effect: You gain +1 Accuracy on Systems saves and checks. You gain the Counterhack reaction, usable once per round.

actions.name: Counterhack
actions.detail: You may take 2 Heat and make a contested tech attack roll against the triggering character. If you win, the triggering tech attack misses.
actions.trigger: You are hit by a tech attack originating from a hostile character within Sensors.

synergies.detail: You gain +1 Accuracy on Systems saves and checks.

name: EVASIVE MANEUVERS
effect: You gain +1 Accuracy on Agility saves and checks. You gain the TEMPNAME reaction, usable once per round.

actions.name: TEMPNAME
actions.detail: You may move up to half your Speed, taking 2 Heat for each space you move, towards the triggering character. This movement ignores Engagement and reactions.
actions.trigger: A weapon attack that includes you as a target within line of sight misses you.

synergies.detail: You gain +1 Accuracy on Agility saves and checks.
